method.text: Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Add the oil, onions and garlic. Fry for 3 min, stirring frequently until softened slightly.
Add the courgettes and slices of peppers. Cook for 5 min.
Stir in the tomato puree. Cook for 1 min.
Stir in the wine and tomatoes. Bring to the boil. Add the trout. Cover and simmer for 10 min.
Season to taste. Stir in the basil. Spoon onto serving plates.

title: Mediterranean trout stew
